item.description:
From the World Rhythm Newsletter:
Brooklyn-based Red Baraat has made a name for itself as one of the best live bands playing anywhere in the world. Led by Sunny Jain, the nine-piece party band, composed of dhol (double-sided barrel-shaped North Indian drum slung over one shoulder), drum set, percussion, sousaphone and five horns, melds infectious North Indian bhangra rhythms, funk, go-go, Latin and jazz.

The Sinclair

Tickets& Information:

http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/01004969DFB9CACC?wt.mc_id=aff_BUYAT_97249&camefrom=CFC_BUYAT_97249

or 617-876-4275.

Doors open at 7pm, the show starts at 8pm
item.name: Red Baraat
